House Bill/Resolution NO. HB04533
FULL TITLE : AN ACT AMENDING REPUBLIC ACT NO. 7699, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "PORTABILITY LAW"
SHORT TITLE : Government Service Insurance System And Social Security System Totalization Of Benefits Application
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROQUE, HARRY L.
DATE FILED : 2016-11-28
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated by the TWG on 2016-10-19
          -Both SSS and GSIS expressed reservations on proposed amendments
          -TWG chaired by Rep. Mariño for measures proposing amendments to both SSS and GSIS
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT ENTERPRISES AND PRIVATIZATION ON 2016-12-06
